Verses: 1 karththaave, Umadhu Seviyaich Saaiththu, En Vinnappaththaik Kettarulum; Naan Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavan.
2 en Aaththumaavaik Kaaththarulum, Naan Bagthiyullavan; En Dhevane, Ummai Nambiyirukkira Umadhu Adiyenai Neer Ratchiyum.
3 aandavare, Enakku Irangum, Naadorum Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren.
4 umadhu Adiyenudaiya Aaththumaavai Magizhchchiyaakkum; Aandavare, Ummidaththil En Aaththumaavai Uyarththugiren.
5 aandavare, Neer Nallavarum, Mannikkiravarum, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugira Yaavarmelum Kirubai Migundhavarumaayirukkireer.
6 karththaave, En Jebaththirkuch Sevikoduththu, En Vinnappangalin Saththaththaik Gavaniyum.
7 naan Thuyarappadugira Naalil Ummai Nokkik Kooppiduven; Neer Ennaik Kettaruluveer.
8 aandavare, Dhevargalukkulle Umakku Nigarumillai; Ummudaiya Kiriyaigalukku Oppumillai.
9 aandavare, Neer Undaakkina Ellaa Jaadhigalum Vandhu, Umakku Munbaagap Panindhu, Umadhu Naamaththai Magimaippaduththuvaargal.
10 dhevareer Magaththuvamullavarum Adhisayangalaich Seygiravarumaayirukkireer; Neer Oruvare Dhevan.
11 karththaave, Umadhu Vazhiyai Enakkup Podhiyum, Naan Umadhu Saththiyaththile Nadappen; Naan Umadhu Naamaththirkup Bayandhirukkumpadi En Irudhayaththai Orumugappaduththum.
12 en Dhevanaagiya Aandavare, Ummai En Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Thudhiththu, Umadhu Naamaththai Endrendraikkum Magimaippaduththuven.
13 neer Enakkup Paaraattina Umadhu Kirubai Periyadhu; En Aaththumaavaith Thaazhndha Paadhaalaththirkuth Thappuviththeer.
14 dhevane, Agangaarigal Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiraargal, Kodumaikkaararaagiya Koottaththaar En Piraananai Vaangath Thedugiraargal, Ummaith Thangalukku Munbaaga Niruththi Nokkaadhirukkiraargal.
15 aanaalum Aandavare, Neer Manavurukkamum, Irakkamum, Neediya Porumaiyum, Poorana Kirubaiyum, Saththiyamumulla Dhevan.
16 enmel Nokkamaagi, Enakku Irangum; Umadhu Vallamaiyai Umadhu Adiyaanukku Aruli, Umadhu Adiyaalin Kumaaranai Ratchiyum.
17 karththaave, Neer Enakkuth Thunaiseydhu Ennaith Thetrugiradhai En Pagaignar Kandu Vetkappadumpadikku, Enakku Anugoolamaaga Oru Adaiyaalaththai Kaanbiththarulum.
